title: Fragment, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidery stitches include satin, running, knot, overcasting, couching on plain weave foundation; quilting stuffed from the back (trapunto); in several areas stitches are combined in deflected element work
description: Fragment, possibly from a quilted petticoat. Elaborate floral sprays in white on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, early 18th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidery stitches include satin, running, knot, overcasting, couching on plain weave foundation; quilting stuffed from the back (trapunto); in several areas stitches are combined in deflected element work. 1990-99-1.
